package.name: Table Functions
package.author: Dan Hoover
package.description: Currently just tableFrom Query with DataTables

function.name: tableFromQuery($results,$opts = [])
function.description: Generates a full striped table from the results of a DB query. Options include passing an opts array of class, head, body for adding classes to those the whole table, head, or body. Passing an $opts['keys'] = an array of keys will override the default table headings. $opts['ucFirst'] = 1 will capitalize the first letters of the default keys.
